channel.title: Favorite?
channel.description:
1) Which staff member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?
2) Which member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?
1) Taharok is my favorite staff member, because he has contributed largely in keeping this community alive and in order.
2) The Soul would be my favorite member, because he's just cool like that.
How about you guys?

item.title: Favorite?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  1. Which staff member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?

Most are gay, besides a few.

  1. Which member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?

Like I said before, most are gay, besides a few.

Don’t have a specific favorite, but I do talk to Tico the most.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite?
item.dc:creator: @k_a_h_leader Aeolian
item.description:
@k_a_h_leader wrote:

1) Which staff member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?

Taharok. I’ve been around with him since 2006 and he’s always done a good job helping out and keeping people in line, with an occasional hint of sarcasm.

2) Which member is your favorite on MoparScape forums, and why?
I don’t know. Newty because he’s mature, well more then most.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite?
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

  1. Mm… I guess Chassy? I really don’t give a fuck about the staff…

  2. Oddly enough Faded Vision, we don’t talk to each other hardly at all, but we seem to have a lot in common, don’t give a shit about what people think of us, like a challenge, and he’s also a hard worker. He isn’t too friendly though but I still respect him

Read full topic
